entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-02-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Don't publish dotnet-sdkplaceholder installers #47073
  • Don't publish dotnet-sdk-internal installers #47071
  • SDK product construction is broken when aspnetcore moves ahead of runtime #47070
  • Introduce a 'PackPrivate' mechanism for private project reference packing #47066
  • Unable to upgrade Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Compatibility NuGet package manually #47061

Closed

  • [NETSDKE2E][Workload set][Mac]With 9.0.201 SDK pkg installed, "Workload update failed: Workload version 9.0.101, which was specified in ..., was not found." happens after running "sudo dotnet workload update --version 9.0.101" #46885
  • Stop generating dotnet-sdk-internal-pgo files #47072

PullRequests

Created

  • Use Arcade's publishing logic to publish a given VMR vertical #47076
    untriaged, Area-VMR
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.3xx' => 'main' #47069
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Change property used for after-publish target #47068
    untriaged
  • Move BuildWithNetFrameworkHostedCompiler to common #47067
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use right hand side references even when not compatible #47065
    untriaged, Area-ApiCompat
  • light up container publish for all Exe/WinExe projects by default #47064
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add Third Party Notices Template to Source Mappings #47058
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update .net10 p1 to p2 in the table #47054
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update implicit version #47053
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Throw error on PublishContainer when EnableSdkContainerSupport is not true #47047
    untriaged, Area-Containers

Merged

  • Clean-up in src/Layout/redist #46994
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Unescape slnf original solution path #46833
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Enable arm64 DEBs #47045
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove dotnet-toolset-internal & dotnet-toolset-langpack archives #47059
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2649696 #47010
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add spec for `dotnet run file.cs` #47020
    documentation, untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Add installer tests project #46927
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Ignore generic type parameter names when matching #40359
    untriaged, Area-ApiCompat
  • Add VMR step to validate asset baseline #46991
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/10.0.1xx-preview2] Set target rid based on passed in prop, instead of host SDK #47023
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Allow to fingerprint Blazor.js #46988
    Area-AspNetCore, 10.0.1xx
  • Try to re-enable APICompat in aspnetcore #45872
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Ignore .lutconfig files via .gitignore #47029
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
